actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the first amendment to the Constitution applies to radio and television broadcasting.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the first amendment to the Constitution applies to radio and television broadcasting.
